name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"e7802208-5970-4a07-9b97-56acb5be12b2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_or_create","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f577739-1e0f-4786-90ee-5a2574af9ede","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_or_create","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a synchronization utility that ensures a variable name is officially defined and registered within a specific scope. It acts as a bridge between the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition Manager","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (which tracks objects globally) and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Scope Manager","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (which tracks variable visibility locally). If a definition for a name doesn't exist at a given namespace, the function creates it and then immediately binds it to the corresponding scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a3aa588d-cc35-43a1-bbb6-5cb52b84c28d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis often encounters variables that haven't been seen before, such as a new local variable assigned inside a function. To track this variable, the analyzer needs two things: a global identity (Definition) and a local presence (Scope).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7734261e-df84-410c-b5b7-ea8b63ba55be","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensured Existence:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It prevents the analyzer from failing when it hits a new name by automatically generating a placeholder.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2e1a93e9-5e35-4fd9-81ff-dd45c2984b87","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Integrity:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" By adding the definition to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nsScope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it ensures that future lookups of that variable name within that code block will return the correct, unique definition object.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"304949e4-1dd8-4a81-8ef0-8a12459c01cb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1035493b-ce58-4a8f-a306-680830a65087","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Global Lookup:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It first checks if a definition already exists for the combined namespace (the parent namespace ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" plus the variable name ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c55a14a6-b7ac-470d-9a50-dec39bb9978e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Creation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If no definition is found, it calls the manager's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getOrCreate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method to instantiate a new definition of the specified ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_type","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (e.g., a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"FUN_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"03fca706-d30f-4509-9814-5fbd9e28427b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Retrieval:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It identifies the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" associated with the parent namespace ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"63cae366-965f-4a70-9976-cbe2ec545f47","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Local Registration:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the scope exists, it adds the definition to that scope's internal dictionary. This "claims" the name ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for that specific scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a9327c69-6c27-4032-9269-e4aa563e74a5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Return:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns the resulting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for further analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07ea5d81-147c-4e90-8ee1-e05731980732","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Consider analyzing the line ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"count = 0","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" inside a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a68de23d-7dd5-4124-b92e-2c7b7640169e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_or_create","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called with ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ns="module.main"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x="count"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_type=NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"990f2111-0231-4230-86ca-b5ccb652742f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.main.count","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It's not found.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d212db71-f55c-4dee-bd22-e2ecf1bb3025","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.main.count","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1386f031-e2de-4b64-a868-1befb36fa5a7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finds the scope for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and registers ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"count","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" there.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d51e2fa1-3bfc-4f51-b8b9-c4aeadf46432","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now, any other part of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that references ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"count","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will be correctly linked to this specific definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"45e52030-3a44-41a7-8261-6dd3a0af2bc9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
